DD2002, I'm with you on the analysis of the complainer, but something everyone ignores is that torrents need to be seeded, so even though I've not uploaded anything, I think people who seed like I do are as important (almost) as uppers. Few people using TPB seed and posters like FFF's usefulness last about a week until the people who dled the original seed stop seeding and the torrent is useless. Upping, in other words, is not the defining factor of a person's contribution to TPB.
